Beginner

Start Your Tech Journey

Perfect for those new to technology. Our comprehensive beginner programs cover programming fundamentals, web development basics, and essential digital skills. No prior experience required.

Interested in flexible learning? Check out our part-time evening and weekend programs!

What Our Graduates Say

SK

Sophea Kem

Machine Learning Engineer

FinTech Cambodia

Seksaa Tech Academy completely transformed my career. The AI & Machine Learning program gave me the skills and confidence to transition from a traditional banking job to becoming a Machine Learning Engineer at a leading fintech company. The instructors were incredibly knowledgeable and supportive throughout the journey.

AI & Machine Learning Bootcamp
RO

Raksmey Ouk

Full-Stack Developer

The web development program at Seksaa Tech Academy exceeded my expectations. I went from having zero programming knowledge to building professional web applications in just 5 months. The part-time schedule was perfect for working professionals like me.

Full-Stack Web Development
